item.description:
Hey Everyone,

I just wanted to quickly clear up any confusion. We are definitely on for tomorrow and I am looking forward to seeing everyone!

Be ready to learn about Ruby on Rails as I share some great sample materials and talk about what it takes to get online with that technology. In addition I am looking forward to chatting about the latest and greatest in tech news.

Please feel free to drop me a line with any questions or call (617.510.3590).

Thanks!
John

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Ruby on Rails, an Introduction
